unnormalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVALS! The entertainment scene is buzzing with film festival news! From Cannes to Kerala, cinephiles are gearing up for a season of cinematic feasts.
normalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVALS! The entertainment scene is buzzing with film festival news! From Cannes to Kerala, cinephiles are gearing up for a season of cinematic feasts.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK) is planning something special for its next edition. Early whispers suggest a focus on regional Indian cinema, maybe even a segment dedicated to films shot entirely in the Northeast.
normalised: Word on the street is that the International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K) is planning something special for its next edition. Early whispers suggest a focus on regional Indian cinema, maybe even a segment dedicated to films shot entirely in the Northeast.

unnormalised: And speaking of feasts, a screening in Mumbai last week featured a post-film biryani spread that was almost as talked about as the movie itself! (We heard rumours of a bidding war over the last plate!)
normalised: And speaking of feasts, a screening in Mumbai last week featured a post-film biryani spread that was almost as talked about as the movie itself! (We heard rumors of a bidding war over the last plate!)

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the Chennai International Film Festival is reportedly partnering with a major Bollywood production house, potentially bringing some serious star power to the event.
normalised: Meanwhile, the Chennai International Film Festival is reportedly partnering with a major Bollywood production house, potentially bringing some serious star power to the event.

unnormalised: Indie filmmakers are also making waves, with several short films from FTII (Film and Television Institute of India) alumni being selected for festivals abroad.
normalised: Indie filmmakers are also making waves, with several short films from F T I I (Film and Television Institute of India) alumni being selected for festivals abroad.

unnormalised: So, grab your popcorn (or maybe some Onam Sadhya, depending on the festival!), because it's going to be a wild ride! Stay tuned for more updates!
normalised: So, grab your popcorn (or maybe some Onam Sadhya, depending on the festival!), because it's going to be a wild ride! Stay tuned for more updates!
